sentence.Network_en: Sam's mother said her son had a good upbringing and schooling.

sentence.Network_en: She called her young son: "Here, Stephen, come and look at this!"

sentence.Network_en: Her son used sign language to tell her what happened.
sentence.Network_cn: 她儿子用手语告诉她发生了什么事。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sunu, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch zoon and German Sohn, from an Indo-European root shared by Greek huios

encyclopedia.content: Son(1988.11.12—)，当红泰国演艺明星，原名ยุกต์ ส่งไพศาล，主演的多部剧集被引入中国，因此而得到中国观众的喜爱。 2008年出演《玻钻之争》（又名《新凤凰血》）男一号琦文而展露头角，2009年出演《爱在日落之前》（又名《愿时光凝结》）颇具人格魅力的男一号南乔，一炮而红。2010年出演《花环夫人》的迪拉卢王，2011年出演《船屋》中的Jane，这两个角色使Son的演艺事业越发红火。2012年，新作《命定天堂》上映，在泰国本地好评如潮。2012年6月15日，第18届上海电视节闭幕式暨白玉兰颁奖典礼举行，Son亮相红毯并出任嘉宾。

entry.def: Someone's son is their male child.

example.ex: He shared a pizza with his son Laurence...
example.tran: 他和儿子劳伦斯分吃了一张比萨饼。

example.ex: Sam is the seven-year-old son of Eric Davies...
example.tran: 萨姆是埃里克·戴维斯 7 岁的儿子。

entry.tran: (某地)之子(籍贯为某地的人，尤指名人)
entry.def: A man, especially a famous man, can be described as a son of the place he comes from.

example.ex: ...New Orleans's most famous son, Louis Armstrong.
example.tran: 新奥尔良最著名的人物——路易斯·阿姆斯特朗

entry.tran: 年轻人，孩子(对男孩或比自己年轻的男子的昵称)
entry.def: Some people use son as a form of address when they are showing kindness or affection to a boy or a man who is younger than them.

example.ex: Don't be frightened by failure, son.

sentences.sentence: "his boy is taller than he is"

Sentence.sentence: Her son Doug is one of several hundred thousand high-school seniors who had a painful fall.
But really, my son is a huge procrastinator (拖延者)
The thought is certainly enough to keep the pot boiling under parents like Meg, the lawyer-mom, as she tries to help her son choose an essay topic.

jushi.english: The sons of the first discoverers are still on the island after centuries.
jushi.chinese: 首批发现者的后裔,几个世纪之后仍住在这个岛上。

jushi.english: Are you willing to do penance for your sins, my son?
jushi.chinese: 你愿意以苦刑赎你的罪吗,孩子?

jushi.english: He was angry to see his son behave badly at the party.
jushi.chinese: 看到他儿子在宴会上不懂礼貌,他很生气。
